confim_delet_student: Are you sure you want to delete these students ?
bug_notification_message: Notification message has not been received
unknown_error: An unknown error occured while the page was loading
view_users_missing_perm: You do not have the rights to list users. Please contact your organisation's administrator.
delete_users_missing_perm: You do not have the rights to delete users. Please contact your organisation's administrator.
create_users_missing_perm: You do not have the rights to create users. Please contact your organisation's administrator.
edit_users_missing_perm: You do not have the rights to edit users. Please contact your organisation's administrator.
new_user_form_hint_password: at least 8 characters (1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, and 1 special character)

not_authorized_error: You are not allowed to do this action (refresh the page if you think you are)

user_create_done_success: The user has been successfully created
mail_already_taken: The mail is already set to another user
